RoadOps

Method Detail

buildRoadsGraph

public static void buildRoadsGraph(Geometry voronoi,
                                   Simulation sim)
Populates the graph representing the road network.

Parameters:
voronoi - The voronoi diagram of the city.
sim - The simulation.

buildRoadsAroundLot

public static void buildRoadsAroundLot(Node lot,
                                       Simulation sim)
Builds a sub-network of crossroads and roads surrounding a single lot.

The sub-network is composed of crossroads placed at the position of the vertices of the Voronoi cell and of roads linking them.

Parameters:
lot - The land lot.
sim - The simulation.

mergeLotRoadsWithNeighbors

public static void mergeLotRoadsWithNeighbors(Node lot,
                                              Simulation sim)
Merges the sub-network of roads of a lot with those of the neighboring lots.

Parameters:
lot - The current lot.
sim - The simulation.

mergeCrossroads

private static void mergeCrossroads(Node crossA,
                                    Node lotA,
                                    Node crossB,
                                    Node lotB,
                                    Simulation sim)
Merges two nodes belonging to two different sub-networks but representing the same crossroad.

The crossroad of the second lot to be merged will be disconnected from the graph and all of its neighbors will be linked with the crossroad of the first lot.

Parameters:
crossA - The first crossroad.
lotA - The lot associated with the first crossroad.
crossB - The second crossroad.
lotB - The lot associated with the second crossroad.
sim - The Simulation.

crossroadOnlySharedBy

public static boolean crossroadOnlySharedBy(Node crossroad,
                                            java.util.List<Node> changedLots,
                                            Simulation sim)

addCrossroad

public static Node addCrossroad(double x,
                                double y,
                                Simulation sim)
Adds a new crossroad to the road graph.

Parameters:
x - The position of the lot on the x-axis.
y - The position of the lot on the y-axis.
sim - The simulation.
Returns:
The newly added node.

removeCrossroad

public static void removeCrossroad(Node crossroad,
                                   Simulation sim)
Removes a node from the road graph.

Parameters:
crossroad - The crossroad to be deleted.
sim - The simulation.

buildRoad

public static void buildRoad(Edge road)
"Builds" a road of the existing road network. The edge representing the road is already in the road network but a boolean attribute "built" is added to differenciate it from the potential roads.

Parameters:
road - The road to build.

isRoadBuilt

public static boolean isRoadBuilt(Edge road)
Checks if the supplied road is built (in the other case it is already part of the road network but only as a potential road).

Parameters:
road - The road to check.

isCrossroadBuilt

public static boolean isCrossroadBuilt(Node crossroad)
Checks if the supplied crossroad is one of the extremities of a built road.

Parameters:
crossroad - The crossroad to check.

isNextToBuiltRoad

public static boolean isNextToBuiltRoad(Edge road)
Checks if the supplied road is linked to a built road via one of its crossroads.

Parameters:
road - The road to check.

isNextToBuiltCrossroad

public static boolean isNextToBuiltCrossroad(Node crossroad)
Checks if the supplied road is linked to a built crossroad.

Parameters:
crossroad - The crossroad to check.
